features: Multi-functional Kids Toys: The LCD Writing Tablet is an educational learning toy for kids. It exercises your child's writing and drawing skills, inspire kids' creativity, develop concentration, imagination, patience. In addition, babies use tablet to doodle, drawing, spelling, math, notes, writing, playing games, vibrant colors and free creative ways can stimulate interest in art, It can let your kids freely release their natural instincts provides endless entertainment for little artists.

Learning Educational Toys: Our Eco-Friendly electronic educational writing tablet for kids, boasting a pressure-sensitive LCD screen, Say goodbye to the mess of crayons and pencils. The colorful doodle pad is easy-to-use, just use the stylus to write, draw, scribble, doodle anything you want! Press the erase button to clear the screen in one second, and it features a lock where you can't accidentally delete the screen and some very vibrant colors. It is a fun addition to any toy collection.

Dinosaur Toys Drawing Tablet: Our 8.5 inch kids drawing tablet adopts the new low-energy consumption eye protection material screen, No Backlight, No Blue Light, No Eye Irritation. Better protect baby's eyesight. The shell and pen is made of safe and durable ABS material, rounded and soft edges, Burr-Free, Non-Toxic, Lead-Free, BPA-free. Every parent absolutely trusts safe and durable toys!

Toddles Travel Toys: The toddles toys can bring child imaginations and creates to life with ease. The drawing pad lightweight and portable design easy to carry make it perfect for on-the-go entertainment, provides kids with a fun and eco-friendly way to draw, write, and take notes with no mess or cleanup required, and the long-lasting battery life ensures hours of uninterrupted fun. Travel toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old boys or girls.

Idea for Kids Gift: Writing board toddler toy as a fantastic gift for kids of all ages. Its simplicity, durability, and endless creative possibilities make it a great addition to playtime, In addition, our toys can also reduce children's anxiety and restlessness, so it is a great gift choice for children with autism and ADHD also. Our drawing tablet is a great birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving gift for boys and girls aged 2-8 years old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doodle Delight: Colorful LCD Writing Tablet - Unleash Young Imaginations!
reviews.reviewText: In a world teeming with high-tech toys, the "LCD Writing Tablet for Kids" stands out as a beacon of creativity and simplicity, perfect for little hands eager to explore, draw, and learn.This isn't just another gadget; it's a canvas for imagination. With its vibrant, colorful screen and easy-to-use stylus, kids can dive into a world of drawing, spelling, and math, turning learning into a fun, engaging activity. Whether it's doodling their dream playground or practicing their ABCs, this tablet turns every scribble into a step towards creativity and education.One of the tablet's most applaudable features is its eco-friendliness. Say goodbye to the endless cycle of paper, crayons, and markers. Here, every stroke is digital, clean, and green. And with the magic erase button, it's like having an endless supply of clean slates, ready for new ideas and creations.Eye safety is a top priority in this digital age, and this tablet addresses that with its low-energy, eye protection material screen. No backlight, no blue light – just a safe, comfortable drawing experience that's gentle on little eyes.The durability of this tablet is another win. Made with safe, durable ABS material, it's built to withstand the enthusiastic handling of a child’s play. The rounded edges and non-toxic design make it a worry-free choice for parents who value safety as much as fun.Its portability is a godsend for any parent on the move. Lightweight and easy to carry, it's the perfect travel companion, keeping kids entertained and engaged on long trips or waiting rooms. The long-lasting battery life is the cherry on top, ensuring uninterrupted playtime.Gifting this tablet is like gifting a world of creativity. I've seen it light up faces on birthdays and holidays, making it a thoughtful and valuable gift for children of all ages, including those with autism and ADHD.In summary, the LCD Writing Tablet for Kids is more than a toy; it's a tool for growth, creativity, and eco-conscious fun. It's an ideal blend of entertainment and education, making it a must-have in the arsenal of young learners and artists. 🎨📚✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun gift for toddlers. I got this drawing pad for my two years old boy , he loves it and wouldn’t put it down. Very easy to use and lightweight. The special pen comes attached to the erasable tablet and with just a touch of a button the screen is cleared for a new work of art and learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for kids
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this writing tablet as a birthday gift for my niece, and I was surprised to see how much she enjoys drawing pictures on it. At just 3 years old, she is full of imagination and creativity, and this tablet allows her to bring her artistic ideas to life. I'm glad she loves using it. This tablet doesn't have a backlight, so I don't have to worry about it harming her eyes. It's a great product for kids to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought as a gift
reviews.reviewText: It was very appreciated by the birthday kid that turned two. Will buy as gift again for that age group.Absolutely worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for on-the-road distraction
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my two year old and he’s obsessed with the cute gator design and ease of use. It’s the perfect toy to bring in the car for little ones to distract themselves with or anywhere that requires waiting (doctor’s office, restaurants, etc). The size isn’t too big and very easy for toddlers and preschoolers (or older) to use. The quality itself is great, trust me, my kiddos have tested it with tantrum-related slams and throws and has still held up very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way
reviews.reviewText: Review: I got this for my niece. It was so perfect, because it is really easy to draw and then she just clicks a little botton and erases the drawing so she can start again. Good quality, cute and keeps her entertain. I would totally recommend. It works with a battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It is cheap
reviews.reviewText: Raggedy cheap toy. I sent it back. I wanted it as a gift, it's so cheap I'd be embarrassed to offer it to any child. I just sent it back. Buyer beware!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love these in the car
reviews.reviewText: Great for road trips and baseball tourneys for my daughter. Keeps here busy. No noise, no mess and the pen is attached which makes it easier to not lose it! My son loves to doodle and even uses it for his math homework because he doesn’t have to waste paper or use a marker and get it all over his hand like dry erase
